Aeotec LED bulb gen5¶

Aeotec by Aeon Labs ZW098 Aeon Labs LED Bulb, Small, White¶

Brief information¶

  • Aeon labs LED bulb is a swith multilevel device based in z-wave.
  • The bulb has 5 main colors: red, green, blue, warm white and cold white
  • Has repeater role in z-wave mess network
  • Can be upgrade firmware via OTA

Specification¶

  • Bulb holder type: E26 for US version, E27 for EU/AU version
  • Max operation power: 9W
  • Max standby power: 0.7W
  • Operating temperature: -10 ~ 45 oC
  • Relative humidity: 8 ~ 80%
  • Operating range: up to 500 feet/150 meters

Inclusion/Exclusion to/from a network¶

  1. LED bulb must be installed with external switch
  2. Put controller to Inclusion/Exclusion mode
  3. Turn off then turn on (via external switch), repeat 3 times within 2 seconds
  4. LED will change its color to indicate include/exclude completes

Link in Amazon¶

https://www.amazon.com/Aeotec-Aeon-Labs-ZW098-Small/dp/B00VQISQW4

Configuration description¶

  1. Enable function of using external switch to turn on/off

    • Parameter: 34 (0x22)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:

      0x00: enable 0x01: disable

    • Default: 0x00

  2. Enable function of using external switch to change color

    • Parameter: 35 (0x23)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:

      0x00: enable 0x01: disable

    • Default: 0x01

  3. Enable to send notification to associated devices (group 1) when LED state is changed

    • Parameter: 80 (0x50)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:

      0x00: nothing 0x01: hail CC 0x02: basic CC report

    • Default: 0x01 - for US version and 0x02 for others

  4. Lock configuration

    • Parameter: 252 (0xFC)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:

      0x00: un-lock configuration 0x01: lock configuration

    • Default: 0
